{"id":692069123,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1651554313,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/692069123/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n          int ans =0;\n        int left=-1;\n        int right=nums.length-1;\n        int sumL=0;\n        int sumR=nums[right];\n        while(true){\n            if(sumR==sumL){\n                if(left+1!=right) {\n                    ans = left + 1;\n                    break;\n                }\n                else{\n                    ans=-1;\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n            if(sumR>sumL){\n                left++;\n                sumL+=nums[left];\n            }\n            if(sumL>sumR){\n                right--;\n                sumR+=nums[right];\n            }\n            if(right==left|| left> right){\n                ans=-1;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
